title: Are you ready for some football?
author: VD
content_html: Ian, PeterAnthony, and Gadspeed, please send me your emails today – or if you’ve gotten an invite, please accept it and check out your team – or those three teams will be reassigned to someone else interested in playing. The Meerkats are chilling. It’s too soon to get excited. They’ve won the regular season title before, they’ve scored the most points, but now it’s time to claim a championship.
content_text: Ian, PeterAnthony, and Gadspeed, please send me your emails today – or if you’ve gotten an invite, please accept it and check out your team – or those three teams will be reassigned to someone else interested in playing.  The Meerkats are chilling.  It’s too soon to get excited.  They’ve won the regular season title before, they’ve scored the most points, but now it’s time to claim a championship.
